file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-49-06-04 - NOSE WHEEL SPIN BRAKE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE WHEEL SPIN BRAKE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Nose-Wheel Spin-Brake. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 32-49-06-000-801-A NOSE-WHEEL SPIN-BRAKE - REMOVAL NOSE-WHEEL SPIN-BRAKE - INSTALLA- ALL 32-49-06-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-49-06 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-49-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NOSE-WHEEL SPIN-BRAKE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the nose-wheel spin-brake. (2) The spin-brake-pad must be replaced whenever it shows such an amount of wear until the surface pad is flush with its attachment screw head allowing the touch between NLG tire and screw head. (3) The two wheel spin-brakes are located on the forward wall of the nose-landing-gear wheelwell. (4) The procedure given is the same for the two spin-brakes. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose-landing-gear wheelwell I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the landing gear safety pin is installed on the nose landing gear ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the bolts (1) and washers (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-49-06 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the spin brake (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-49-06 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Nose-Wheel Spin-Brake - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 113 114 B DET. A SPIN BRAKE (2) 1. WASHER (12) 2. BOLT (12) SPIN BRAKE PAD (4) DET. B 145AMM320147.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-49-06 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-49-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. NOSE-WHEEL SPIN-BRAKE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the nose-wheel spin-brake. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose-landing-gear wheelwell H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the spin brake (3) in the installation position, on the wheelwell wall. (2) Install the washers (2) and bolts (1).
